x.description: A numeric or unit object specifying ggplot x-location

y.description: A numeric, unit object, or character containing a "b"combined with a numeric value specifying ggplot y-location

width.description: A numeric or unit object specifying ggplot width

height.description: A numeric or unit object specifying ggplot height

just.description: Justification of ggplot relative to its (x, y) location

default.units.description: A string indicating the default units to useif \code{x}, \code{y}, \code{width}, or \code{height} are only givenas numerics

params.description: An optional \link[plotgardener]{pgParams} object containingrelevant function parameters
